channel.title: SQL on Corner case
channel.description: Recent content in SQL on Corner case

item.title: Basic Understanding of SELECT statement
item.description: The syntax: SELECT [ DISTINCT | ALL ] { * | } FROM [ { , } . . . ] [ WHERE ] [ GROUP BY ] [ HAVING ] [ ORDER BY ] The evaluation: ● FROM clause ● WHERE clause (optional) ● GROUP BY clause (optional) ● HAVING clause (optional) ● SELECT clause ● ORDER BY clause (optional)
